Hi, my name is

Ha Nguyen

A Web Developer

About Me

I'm Ha, an aspiring developer who loves to build fun and useful things for the web. Drawing from my background in molecular, cellular, and developmental biology, I have a deep appreciation for the intricate balance between form and function. I have also spent some time in dentistry where I have developed a keen sense of aesthetics and a sharp eye for detail. I enjoy connecting with people and even more so, helping people with my technical expertise. Currently, I am focused on The Odin Project's Full Stack JavaScript online curriculum where I am constantly working on projects and mastering new technologies.
